snippet: City leaders from Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington met Friday with top executives at the U.S. Olympic Committee to hear about the nuts and bolts of bidding for the 2024 Olympics....

headline.print_headline: City Leaders Talk 2024 With US Olympic Committee
headline.main: City Leaders Talk 2024 With US Olympic Committee

lead_paragraph: City leaders from Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington met Friday with top executives at the U.S. Olympic Committee to hear about the nuts and bolts of bidding for the 2024 Olympics.
